{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1347235,"totalDownVotes":149188,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":487766,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
Development Info- Wolfpaq has been and is in the process of moving in real life. Updates to the game will still continue, but may be delayed. We apologize for any inconvenience.

RP Set- A term used to identify a house or structure that has a central theme that can be more specifically roleplayed with. It will be marked different than a normal house.

We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4389101,"totalDownVotes":814097,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":225265,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3923252,"totalDownVotes":324430,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":92255,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":582196,"totalDownVotes":54900,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[TRICKY P.3] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":49492,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":704857,"totalDownVotes":52223,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":59916,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":276579,"totalDownVotes":24428,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":50004,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3200
There are 32 Physical Fruits In Game

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes - 1 Hours / Despawn 15 Minutes.
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability

Cr Clothing : Blotnik"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":579939,"totalDownVotes":41347,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":36717,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool
🐤Developers: Tacomura, AStrongMuscle, MoltenPrime, AngeIicMar
🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2121190,"totalDownVotes":292477,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":60390,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":376510,"totalDownVotes":37878,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":27778,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE』 🏹✨
➢ New stand models, auras, skins
➢ New VFX
➢ 2 New Codes in the youtube channel below and more!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2915020,"totalDownVotes":377691,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":37447,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

"},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2254275,"totalDownVotes":308868,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":85679,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! ✨ We're working on more updates!

🔔Click the Follow button for update notifications! And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2248324,"totalDownVotes":685192,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":71339,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4422730,"totalDownVotes":598079,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak 👁","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":30132,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👁 Are you prepared for The Great Tomb Robbery? Stay tuned...

Our recent Jailbreak update:  
💥 Interrogator police vehicle, and limited time agent vehicle!
🔥 PIT MANEUVERS! 
⚽️ New Soccer Ball reward!
🎉 5B Visits Garage Spoiler! TY!! ❤️



🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1493300,"totalDownVotes":123729,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":35482,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Liked the game? Don't forget to leave a Thumbs Up(👍) and Favorite(🌟) . Thank you!

Don't forget to check out our group!
https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840

Group Perks:
✨Member✨
--- 25% more gold!
💫Mega Member💫
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!
🌟Royal Member🌟
--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":574712,"totalDownVotes":44275,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":23043,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! If you're feeling up for a challenge, try taking on harder bosses on harder difficulties!

👥💵 Join the group for +$100 starting cash! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Thumbs up and favorite for more quality updates!🌟

🔨UPDATES🔨
+ 🥶 FROST INVASION EVENT
+ ❄️ FROST SEASON
+ 🔨 SLEDGER TOWER
+ 📦 FROST SKINS
+ 💀 TOXIC GUNNER
+ 💪 TOWER REWORKS
+ 🛠️ BUG FIXES + CHANGES

Read full update log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-frost-invasion-update

✨Lead Dev/Design: BelowNatural
📜Scripter: Razuatix
🎹Music Composer: Phoqus
🔊SFX Designer: BiddinUp
🖼️GFX Designer: Jaaziar

🏆 8th Annual Bloxy Award Winner
Google "TDS Wiki" for in-depth game info!"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":301614,"totalDownVotes":155991,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":28451,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":183414,"totalDownVotes":9517,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🤝UPDATE 3.5] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":12780,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1053510,"totalDownVotes":53378,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":18061,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 18]:
- 💸SALE!
- 🌟SEASON 4!
- ⚔️NEW TOURNAMENT MODE!
- 💥3 NEW QUIRKS!
- 🔴1 NEW BLOODLINE!
- 🍋1 NEW FRUIT!
- 👿NEW BOSS!
- 🐰EASTER EVENT!
- 🌌NEW AURA CHEST!
- 🥚EASTER DECORATION!
- 🔥2 NEW POWERS!
- 🛡️5 NEW CHAMPIONS!
- 💪3 NEW TRAINING AREAS!
- ⚔️8 NEW SWORD SKINS!
- 🗡️1 NEW SWORD!
- ⚖️POWER BALANCING!

⭐Join BlockZone for a 5% increased training boost:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/5202664/BlockZone#!/about

🎁Follow us on Twitter for codes and updates on the game:
Director: @NyxunRBX
Head Developers: @RobxSoft, @_Chichine
Scripters: @_DevCrow, @eXo0ne_, @lyzrinn, @Dact_ylioglyph
Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":205873,"totalDownVotes":33637,"universeId":578392296,"name":"Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":12788,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2390521,"totalDownVotes":251927,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 8!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":51323,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":21741,"totalDownVotes":7355,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🛌🏹 [BETA RELEASE!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":20535,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to the BedWars beta release!

We will be updating the game daily during Beta. Report any issues on twitter and the community server!

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open inventory
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a match
🛌 Protect your bed. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the match!

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":734201,"totalDownVotes":97370,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 📫","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":17888,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

🌲 Build your own island
👩‍🌾 Create huge farms
🐔 Raise animals
💸 Sell items to make money
⚔️ Loot monsters and bosses
👨‍🍳 Cook tasty delicacies
🔥 And more!

Controls:
[E]: Open inventory

👑 Creators:
SnickTrix (https://twitter.com/lukechatton)
spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1217981,"totalDownVotes":69088,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":15906,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":6639766,"creatorName":"Century Makers","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":63767,"totalDownVotes":7415,"universeId":2549475383,"name":"[Update 5] 🏕️Livetopia","placeId":6737970321,"playerCount":40359,"imageToken":"T_6737970321_b832","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💪 We have patched against the malicious exploits. We will continue monitoring the servers to create a safe and stable environment for Topia citizens. Thanks for your patience and supports!
___/👁 What's New 👁\___
🏠 A free new house is added!
📜 Long list of new items! Van, Tent, Grill... try them out!
🐾 More interactions with pets! Feeding and riding!
🏕️ Park is up. Go camping!
📝 More details from the Patch Notes below.
______
✔️ Roleplaying! Choose your own roles, outfits, and careers!
🏡 Own different houses and cars! And fly in the air!
🐱 Play with unique pets! Aren't they cute?!
🧐 Find secrets in the place!

Sneak Peek: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/1237958 (updated 5/28)
Patch Notes: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/1237968 (updated 5/31)

Thumbs-up 👍 and Favorite ⭐ if you enjoy the game and Follow 🔊 us to get timely updates! 
___/🔥 Lovetopia 🔥\___
👍 50k likes to unlock Golf Stick 🏌️! (Unlocked)
👍 70k likes to unlock Mini Bus 🚌!"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1826299,"totalDownVotes":142989,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8234,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
